content: 10 fasten_off and leave tail for sewing sew on between eyes ©copyright all rights reserved by @creativibs 2024 simple hat this is the cowboy hat from my dave the angry duck pattern i just shaped it to look more like a fedora r1 ch7 skip first chain single_crochet 5 do 3 single_crochet in the last st then single_crochet 5 on the other side of the chain 3 single_crochet in the last st 16 r2-3 single_crochet around for 2 rounds 16 r4 blo increase 6 single_crochet 2 increase 6 single_crochet increase 20 r5 single_crochet around 20 r6 2 increase 6 single_crochet 4 increase 6 single_crochet 2 increase 28 r7-8 single_crochet for 2 rounds 28 r9 blo single_crochet increase all the way around 40 fasten_off ©copyright all rights reserved by @creativibs 2024
